items.value: A diplomat named %00@ from %01@ has arrived at %04@ to start peace negotiations between the two factions.
%113% attempted to disrupt the peace negotiations initiated by %00@ between %01@ and %11@ but was unable to make any dent on it. The two were able to negotiate a truce.
Peace negotiations between %01@ and %11@ have broken down. War continues!
%113% successfully disrupted the peace negotiations initiated by %00@ between %01@ and %11@. The negotiations broke down!
%113% successfully ensured that the peace negotiations initiated by %00@ between %01@ and %11@ would complete smoothly. The two were able to negotiate a truce.
Peace negotiations between %01@ and %11@ have broken down. War continues!

%113% attempted to ensure that the peace negotiations initiated by %00@ between %01@ and %11@ would complete smoothly but it still fell apart at the last minute. There won't be a truce between the two factions.
The peace negotiations initiated by %00@ between %01@ and %11@ was a success! A truce has been declared between the two factions.
Peace negotiations between %01@ and %11@ have broken down. War continues!
The peace negotiations initiated by %00@ between %01@ and %11@ broke down! The war continues.
